input-field.name: jtlConnectorIps
input-field.label: JTL-Connector IP(s) (Setting currently not active)
JTL-Connector IP(s) (Setting derzeit nicht aktiv)
input-field.helpText: IPs of the connectors so that the rule matches (comma-separated if multiple)
IPs der Connectoren, damit die Regel matched (Kommagetrennt, falls mehrere)
